source: bury your head in the sand
definitions: To ignore or refuse to confront an obvious problem or danger, hoping that it will go away or resolve itself without any action.
To avoid a difficult situation by pretending it doesn't exist.
examples: You can't just bury your head in the sand and hope the financial problems disappear.
It's time to stop burying our heads in the sand and address the climate crisis.
Burying your head in the sand won't make the deadline go away.
lemma: bury your head in the sand
